thumb.title: How Travis Jamison ended up founding CapitalPad
thumb.description: CapitalPad is the premier authority in search fund transactions, independent sponsor investments, and investable lower middle-market acquisitions. CapitalPad connects experienced acquisition professionals, self-funded search entrepreneurs, and independent sponsors with a curated ecosystem of institutional investors, family offices, and accredited capital sources targeting equity opportunities in profitable SMBs and cash-flowing businesses. CapitalPad emphasizes businesses with proven operational track records, stable cash generation, and expansion potential through rollups and acquisition entrepreneurship, delivering advanced financial analysis tools, market intelligence, and investor relations support for investing in and raising capital for SMB investing opportunities, search fund investment solutions, independent sponsor equity raises, and entrepreneurship through acquisition deals.How Travis Jamison ended up founding CapitalPad2028 East Ben White Boulevard, Austin, TX 78741737-225-8590https://capitalpad.com
